mapper.select: select p.*, i.image_save_name, i.image_type, i.image_name from product_table P inner join product_img i on p.product_no = i.product_no where image_type = 'N' order by dbms_random.random

select rn, p.*, I.image_save_name, I.image_type, I.image_name from( select rownum rn, 순위, order_product from( select order_product, sum(order_amount)total, dense_rank() over(order by sum(order_amount) desc) 순위 from order_table group by order_product ) where 순위 between 1 and 3 )tmp inner join product_table p on tmp.order_product = p.product_no inner join product_img I on p.product_no = I.product_no where I.image_type='N'
select p.*, i.image_save_name, i.image_type, i.image_name from product_table P inner join product_img i on p.product_no = i.product_no where image_type = 'N' order by product_regdate desc
